name: Piss Me Off
description:
Piss Me Off - A Comedy Game that aims to anger the victim by manipulating his home environment.

How To Play : 

-Use Mouse To Scroll Right or Left

- Use Left Mouse Button to Interact with Object

-Interact with the environment such as manipulating the TV to show what your victims hate the most, etc. Your goal is to manipulate the environment in order to make him angrier and angrier!!!
